# Default

## Usage
`@default [<value>]`
 
## Overview
Allows you to document the assigned value of a variable.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @class Person
 */
class Person {
    /**
     * @constructor
     */
    constructor(config = {}) {
        super(config);

        /**
         * @member {String} Medication#name
         * @default ""
         */
        this.name = config.name || "";
    }
}
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-default.html)**
